# PR Diff Instructions

The diff below contains **ONLY** the changes in this PR. Do NOT run `git diff` yourself - the diff has already been computed correctly using the merge-base between the PR branch and `${BASE_REF}`.

**To get the correct diff, use this command:**

```bash
git diff ${MERGE_BASE}..HEAD
```

**Files changed in this PR:**

```
${CHANGED_FILES}
```

**Full PR Diff:**

```diff
${PR_DIFF}
```
